Text: FW JCrew invites you to take offHeres a coupon from J Crew our more than generous counterparty Enjoy Chris JCrew invites you to take off Please enjoy the attached shopping event with my thanks Scott Dear Corporate Partner Its time for another JCrew corporate event and just in time for your holiday shopping From November thth you and the members of your company are invited to take off everything in our stores and online at jcrewcom You missed our last event Or you love all our great new styles for yourself and everyone on your giftgiving list Heres your opportunity to get them in our stores and at jcrewcom youll find the seasons bestand by clicking below youll find that extra little incentive too To find your invitation please visit the following URL that you should forward to your colleagues jcrewcomcontentpromosFecorporatecorporatenightjhtmlsrcCodeYISN cgibinfloyhGmRREFcTHNFMAU You can also find this invitation in the attached Adobe Acrobat document If you are unable to open the attachment you can download Acrobat Reader at adobecom cgibinfloyhGmRREFcTHKuAv Heres the fine print To receive the discount your employees can simply print the emailinvite please remember that you must have it in order to receive the discount and present it to the cashier at any of our stores Or if they prefer to receive their discount online at jcrewcom they can simply enter the word CORP in the redeem coupon box on the first checkout page Please note that this discount does not apply to online clearance items or in our catalog Thank you so much for acting as the corporate contact for this event We hope that you and your colleagues will take advantage of this invitation If you have any questions feel free to contact me directly either by email or at Best regards Stephanie Garbarini Director of Brand Marketing cgibinflosensingyGmRREFcTH
